group_1.textRight: This is bad! Really reaaaaally baaad!
Nacchan is quitting the broadcasting club!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eeeeeeeeeh!?

group_1.textRight: That's gonna mean there’ll only be 4 of us...
If we don't have at least 5 members we'll be closed down!

group_1.textLeft: We need to convince someone, somehow...

group_1.textRight: But how ...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, Senpai!

group_1.textRight: Oh, do you have any ideas Meguru!?

group_1.textLeft: Is it okay if I eat some candy?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, of course!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:304201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Woohoo! Thanks!~
...Uh... Aren't we a little too calm about this!?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but...
The student council and committee already take care @of broadcasting every school event.
It wouldn't be surprising if our club is closed down...

group_1.textLeft: Um, my Senpais...

group_1.textRight: Mmm?

group_1.textLeft: For Meguru, I think the broadcasting club is the best place to be.

group_1.textRight: Meguru...

group_1.textLeft: Surrounded by kind senpais, and delicious sweets
Everyday is fun!

group_1.textRight: *Giggling* Isn't it!

group_1.textLeft: But if we don't do anything we won't be allowed to @use this room anymore, right?

group_1.textRight: Huh!? @Then we're screwed!
Let's come up with a plan to attract new members to the club!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
(My plan was to use the broadcasting club as the @first step to reaching my dreams.)
(It'll be a big problem if the club gets shut down...!)

group_1.textCenter: I couldn't come up with a good strategy...
(If only Meguru was able to think of ways to help @out..)
(...Meguru needs to level up her skills for this...)
(Maybe...@[wait:1.0][chara:304201:cheek_0][chara:304201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]There is a way to save the broadcasting club...?)
(Ah... If only something would happen that I could broadcast about...)

group_1.textRight: Hi, Meguru Hibiki.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?
Eh!

group_1.textRight: I am Kyubey.

group_1.textLeft: Kyu..... Eh?!
(What a mysterious animal... It can speak?!)
(This... is a real mystery incident!? Can I use this to improve my skills...?)
...Wh-what a mystery!
It's a speaking, um...[chara:304201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304201:cheek_0][chara:304201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:304201:lipSynch_1] tanuki?
No, that's not it... @A civet then?!
Not quite...
Geh...
Argh! No, Meguru is useless, completely useless @at this!
Meguru's... just gonna have to give up on her @dream...

group_1.textRight: Dream? What are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Um...
Meguru's dream is to be a popular MC.

group_1.textRight: MC?

group_1.textLeft: A host for live events, who’s on TV, or on the scene!
I joined the broadcasting club as my first step to my dream...
But no matter how much I practice, I can't pull off @doing live commentary.
And now, the broadcasting club is getting @destroyed...

group_1.textRight: I see.
I can make that wish come true.

group_1.textLeft: Eh... How?

group_1.textRight: I want you to make a contract with me, @and become a magical girl.
Magical girls bear the destiny of fighting witches.
But in exchange I can grant any one wish of yours.

group_1.textLeft: Ma-magical girl?... Witch...?
I'm not really sure what you mean...
But if you can really fulfill Meguru's wish...
Make Meguru a popular MC!

group_1.textRight: The contract is complete.
